name: Nature, Culture, Time for Adventure
description: Hong Kong is a modern city, which is is named as a very famous financial center of Asia pacific. Here you can find concrete jungle, buildings instead of blue sky. However, this big city also have a really unknown, undiscovered beauty, which the hilly Hong Kong is stilling waiting for people to explore. Here we got lots of beautiful nature, Country Parks,geopark which located nearly in every districts, where you can do hiking, panic, just for a ride, sunrise, sunset. Here, you can surf, you can enjoy wonderful sun bathing, for sure, have a refreshing swim in the place which surrounded by ocean. In culture part, here we are the place combined with chinese culture and as a colony of the Britain, our culture definitely a mixture of chinese milk tea, and the british milk tea. Local old districts you can find the most crowded and color over-whelming  stores and shops.
